column2: Boxed In - Modeling a Low-Poly Person
In part 1 of this activity, you'll create a realistically-sized, low-poly person, for use any any later projects you want to make!
Hey, {{user_name}}, welcome (or welcome back) to Blender! Don't forget that a USB mouse with 2 buttons and a scroll wheel is very helpful for using Blender. I strongly recommend it.
The easiest way to follow along with these tutorials is to adjust your windows so that you can see both Blender and the video.
I'll start up Blender and launch the video, but if you close the window, here's a link back to it - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4OUYOKGl7x0
Oh, and one more thing, the video mentions a character sheet - I put yours in your home directory, under /BlenderSources/LowPolyPerson.
Have fun! Remember, you can always restart this activity if you need to see the tips or link.
